name: container_1
description: the jar file location of the 'latest_vulnerable_version' of the package

name: container_2
description: the jar file location of the 'fixed_version' of the package

name: class_1
description: path of the modified class file in container_1

name: class_2
description: path of the modified class file in container_2

name: cve_id
description: The CVE id, which is 'vulnerability_id' in project-kb dataset and 'aliases' in GHSA dataset.

name: latest_vulnerable_version
description: the latest version of the artifact before the fixed version

name: repo
description: the git repository of the library

name: fix_commit
description: hash of the commit that patches the vulnerability

name: modified_methods
description: list of modified method in the 'fix_commit'
